channel.title: Quick question
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Quick question" - Note Pages and looping

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
To my knowledge, no perm item stacks with itself. It will stack with items that have different names.

Example: Heck Butterfly, Swallowtail Butterfly and Dog Collar give +10 stamina each.

Heck Butterfly, Swallowtail Butterfly, Dog Collar: +30 Stamina
Heck Butterfly, Heck Butterfly, Dog Collar: +20 Stamina
Dog Collar, Dog Collar, Dog Collar: +10 Stamina
Heck Butterfly, Heck Butterfly, Swallowtail Butterfly, Dog Collar, Dog Collar, Dog Collar: +30 Stamina

Everything follows this pattern, even monster drops as far as I know.

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded: They do not stack. They're fairly common items.

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
ok, sweet i'll aply for that ;)

and quick question part 3:

I just got a second giant fan… should i keep that or give it to my village/sell it? i mean do they stack? so if one gives you 1 nin strenght would 2 of em giva you +2?

mfg
Thark

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded: It allows you to edit all pages on the site except for certain important pages (navigation pages, village pages, the front page, etc).

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
quick question part 2:

why would i wanna become a wikimember… i mean what can i do then or what am i supposed to do then? … i just couldn't find what it "means" to be a member of this site ;).

but i wanna be a member, cuz i like the site ;)

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
I don't remember… but it was here on the forum because someone was asking what to do with their extra note pages and somebody told them to keep one and get a theme. They never said what the theme was of course.

*sigh*

Thx.

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
Who fed you that line of nonsense? >.>
You don't get themes for having Note Pages. You do, however, gain a theme for The Tote.

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded: ooh cool idea but u think they come in pink too? xD

item.title: Re: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
I looped with 11 note pages. I didn't even get a t-shirt.

Hmmm… I like that idea. A new item… Blank White T-shirt: Secret +2 difficulty to track you for Bingo attempts.

item.title: Quick question
item.content:encoded:
Do you really get some theme for having a note page when you loop? Someone said you did but I don't see it on our list.

Just want to know cuz if it is not true i am going to use my page before I loop.
